Sentence.value: Your agent should be: - An adult, 18 years or older - Someone you trust and can talk to about the care you want and what is important to you - Someone who supports your treatment choices In many states, your agent cannot be: - Your doctor or health care provider - An employee of your doctor or of a hospital, nursing home, or hospice program where you receive care, even if the person is a trusted family member
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your agent should be: - An adult, 18 years or older - Someone you trust and can talk to about the care you want and what is important to you - Someone who supports your treatment choices In many states, your agent cannot be: - Your doctor or health care provider - An employee of your doctor or of a hospital, nursing home, or hospice program where you receive care, even if the [[person|C0027361]] is a [[trusted|C0237935]] [[family member|C0086282]]
